--- title: "Projects" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.grid}

feathers

[feathers]{.monosp} is an R package that contains colour palettes inspired by the plumage of Australian birds. For species exhibiting sexual dimorphism, I have used female colours.

Variations on a theme

Sometimes I make art in R ([rtistry]{.monosp}). These projects are spaces for me to explore a single idea and experiment with code.

VictualVerses

A Shiny app that generates three-line verses in the style of haiku. A random word is chosen from "Mrs. Beeton's Dictionary of Every-Day Cookery", and the following 17 syllables are output in lines of 5-7-5(ish) syllables.

Manky Parrots

Manky Parrots is a citizen science project that maps the incidence of psittacine beak and feather disease (PBFD) in Australia to understand the spread of the disease in the wild.

misc.

Links to repositories where I've dabbled in [this](https://github.com/shandiya/project_euler), [that](https://github.com/shandiya/advent-of-code), and [the other](https://github.com/shandiya/genuary2021). Sometimes they involve [maps](https://github.com/shandiya/30DayMapChallenge), [sometimes not](https://github.com/shandiya/TidyTuesday).

koel

[koel]{.monosp} contains a set of functions that facilitate the process of retrieving and summarising biodiversity data within spatial and temporal constraints, and emailing these data as a summary table.

:::
